ISSUE.TITLE: Error: Cannot find module 'jsonfile'
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When running pnpm. ``` Error: Cannot find module 'jsonfile' Require stack: - /xxx/node_modules/.pnpm/nc-help@0.1.100_sqlite3@5.0.0/node_modules/nc-help/dist/main/main.js - /xxx/node_modules/.pnpm/nocodb@0.9.17/node_modules/nocodb/dist/bundle.js ``` You need to add `jsonfile` as a dep to `nc-help`. Where is `nc-help` by the way? --- `axios` is also missing. And `mkdirp` from `nocodb`.
